mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_city_area(mines):
    if not mines:
        return 0
    x_coords = [mine[0] for mine in mines]
    y_coords = [mine[1] for mine in mines]
    max_x = max(x_coords)
    min_x = min(x_coords)
    max_y = max(y_coords)
    min_y = min(y_coords)
    side_length = max(max_x - min_x, max_y - min_y)
    return side_length * 2

    min_y = min(y_coords)
    side_length = max(max_x - min_x, max_y - min_y)
    return side_length + 2
